articles.author: Olivia Raimonde
articles.title: Corporate America Ignores Powell Warnings, Borrows Another $570 Billion - Bloomberg
articles.description: The recent spike in bond yields may have briefly cooled the market, but the pace of borrowing has been blistering.
articles.content:
For the past 18 months, Federal Reserve Chair Jerome Powell has frantically been trying to break Americans' borrow-and-spend habits. Its critical to his fight against inflation.

articles.title: Ancient footprints upend timeline of humans' arrival in North America - The Washington Post
articles.description: Dozens of fossilized human footprints in New Mexico have reignited a long-running debate about when people first arrived in the Americas.
